content: *hopping little rabbit through the grass she bounds past snowdrops and daffodils to her home in the mound the sun lights her cottontail through the willow veil it follows in her steps between the roots to where she dwells * by polly thomas top down socks worked in the round with a heel flap and gusset and instructions on how to work this in a contrast yarn the zig zag lace and cottontail textured panel is worked down the center front of the socks the rest of the sock is worked in stockinette sizes small medium large finished sock circumference un stretched 18 20 5 23 cm / 7 8 9 skill level a basic understanding of sock construction how to work knits purls yarn overs directional decreases and kitchener stitch this pattern has been tested and tech edited
